data.scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Formalization of Micro Food processing Enterprises Scheme (PMFME)  - Support to Individual Micro Enterprises
data.benefits: Scheme provides credit-linked capital subsidy @35% of the eligible project cost with a maximum ceiling of Rs.10 lakh per unit.
data.eligibility: All micro food processing units in operations are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The applicant should be above 18 years of age and should possess at least VIII standard pass educational qualification. 
  2. The enterprise should be unincorporated and should employ less than 10 workers. 
  3. The applicant should have ownership right of the enterprise. Applicant ready to contribute 10% of project cost.
data.beneficiaries: All micro food processing units in operations are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The applicant should be above 18 years of age and should possess at least VIII standard pass educational qualification. 
  2. The enterprise should be unincorporated and should employ less than 10 workers. 
  3. The applicant should have ownership right of the enterprise. Applicant ready to contribute 10% of project cost.
data.context: This scheme is introduced to Support for transition of existing 2,00,000 enterprises into formal framework.
data.objective: The main aim is to Increased access for the enterprises, to professional and technical support.
data.description: Scheme provides credit-linked capital subsidy @35% of the eligible project cost with a maximum ceiling of Rs.10 lakh per unit.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://pmfme.mofpi.gov.in/pmfme/#/Register-New-User
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefit after the approval of the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Udyam Registration Certificate 
2. GST Certificate 
3. Financials for Last 2 years 
4. Projected financial data 
5. Lending Bank Details 
6. Basic KYC Documents
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 
Ministry of Food Processing Industries
Panchsheel Bhawan, 
August Kranti Marg,
Khelgaon, New Delhi-110049

Email id: support-pmfme@mofpi.gov.in  
Contact Details: 011-26406500
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale  - Up
